plotting_tool_page.label: Colour mapping
plotting_tool_page.tooltip: Colour mapping tool for adjusting contrast, brightness and other image colour settings

plotting_tool_page.label: Histogram
plotting_tool_page.tooltip: Updated colour mapping tool for adjusting contrast, brightness and other image colour settings

plotting_tool_page.label: Colour mapping
plotting_tool_page.tooltip: Colour mapping tool for adjusting contrast, brightness and other image colour settings

colour_category.name: Sequential 1 (approximately monochromatic with variation between two colours)
colour_category.description: Approximately monochromatic colormaps varying smoothly between two color tones---usually from low saturation (e.g. white) to high saturation (e.g. a bright blue)

colour_category.name: Sequential 2 (variation between two or more colours)
colour_category.description: Approximately monochromatic colormaps varying smoothly between two-three color tones

colour_category.name: Divergent (with median value)
colour_category.description: Colour maps with median value (usually light in color) and which vary smoothly to two different color tones at high and low values

colour_category.name: Qualitative (rapid variation in colours)
colour_category.description: Colormaps which vary rapidly in color; useful for choosing a set of discrete colors

colour_category.name: Miscellaneous
colour_category.description: Colormaps that don't fit into other categories
